Introduction

Cao Lu, formerly known as lulu, is a Chinese singer, actress and presenter under NS ENM, EE-MEDIA and Bomnal Entertainment.. She was a member and the Lead Dancer, Vocalist and the Face of the Group of the South Korean girl group FIESTAR, under FAVE Entertainment (LOEN Entertainment/Kakao M sub-lable).

She debuted in China as a soloist on June 1, 2005 with the single album "Cat" as Lulu. She debuted with FIESTAR on August 31, 2012 with the single album "Vista" and the title track of the same name.

FIESTAR disbanded on May 15, 2018 after four of the members' contracts ended on April 30 and decided not to renew. On May 22, 2024, Cao Lu shared that she had bought partial copyrights of their previous singles with an intent to re-record them in Chinese.

Fun facts

1
Cao Lu beat famous flexible idol Cheng Xiao of WJSN on "Flower Road" in leg splits.
…
2
Cao Lu is Miao, a minority ethnic group in China. Possibly the only one in Korea
…
3
On "Can I Join You," an elderly women suggested Cao Lu marry her nephew because of her great Korean food cooking skills.
…
4
Kang Daniel was once Cao Lu's backup dancer.
…
5
In 2004, Cao Lu won a China CCTV singing contest and took Teen Rookie award on CCTV
…
6
Cao Lu is known as "The Mood Maker" and still appears on variety shows once in a while
…
7
Cao Lu was on "We Got Married" with comedian & mc Jo Seho
…
8
In 2016, Cao Lu was among many Chinese idols who supported the South China Sea movement in China
…
